about_the_game:
Spinny Dungeon is a roguelike deckbuilder with elements of an auto battler.

You were crawling through dungeons as usual. One dungeon... You saw a strange portal in the corner of the room and a huge button in front of it. You pressed that button. Then you pressed it again, and again, and again...

The Demon of the Slot Machine has sent his minions to find your soul. Stop these monsters before they reach the RED ZONE.

Features

  • Build the perfect deck. Add weapons, plants, magic artifacts and companions to your deck of symbols. After each spin they will be randomly rearranged on the board.
  • Don't starve. Picking a strong companion who eats too much can be fatal not only to your enemies but also to your run.
  • Mana, gold or pure damage? It's hard to have plenty of all. So choose wisely.
  • Learn new spells and upgrade the old ones. Defeating the boss at the end of the level will give you access to more powerful spells.
  • Explore various play styles with different heroes. You can get rich by stealing gold from the foes or crush them instantly by blowing up your own symbols.
  • Atone for your sins. The Demon of the Slot Machine knows that gambling is not your only sin. Every sin adds its own challenge. You need to complete all the challenges to free your soul.

short_description: The slot machine roguelike. Each time you hit the SPIN button monsters creep closer. KILL 'em! LOOT 'em! EAT 'em! Focus on spells or synergies between symbols. Spin to DIE or spin to SURVIVE!
